item.title: Achieve Financial Peace and Stability
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description:
After covering the cost of my house and ensuring a basic monthly allowance, having ‚Çπ1 crore as a financial backup should provide stability and security.

Saving 15 Lakhs by Jan 5, 2028. I want to be financially stable before my 60th birthday.

item.title: Learn German
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description: I have paid ‚Çπ30,000 for A1 and A2 German classes, and I need to take the A1 exam, which will cost ‚Çπ7,000. My target is to take the exam in November 2025. To become certified in German language, I plan to clear A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, and C2 levels by Jan 5, 2038.
